CustomField.formula:
IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(SBQQ__RenewedContract__c)), CloseDate >= DATEVALUE($Label.Checkout_Link_For_Renewal_Go_Live_Date) ), Renewal_Checkout_Agreement_Link__c, IF( AND( Probability >= 0.50, ISBLANK(Reseller__c), Amount > 0, ISBLANK(Deal_Components__c), OR(AND( Renewal__c = true, OR(ISPICKVAL(Sub_Type__c, 'Clickpath'),SBQQ__RenewedContract__r.Auto_Renewal__c = true), OR(Gainsight_Audit_Status__c = 'Success',Gainsight_Audit_Override__c = true) ), Renewal__c = false,!ISPICKVAL(Sub_Type__c,'Clickpath') ), !AND(ISPICKVAL(Selected_Payment_Type__c,'Direct Semi-Annual'),Owner_Segment__c = 'AE1'), !AND(ISPICKVAL(Selected_Payment_Type__c,'Direct Quarterly'),Owner_Segment__c = 'AE1') ), IF( AND(OR(AND(SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__c != NULL,ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__r.SBQQ__Status__c,"Approved"), Sales_Tax_Amount__c >= 0), AND(CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c, "AE1"), Total_Sales_Tax__c >= 0 ) ), !ISBLANK(TEXT(Selected_Payment_Type__c)), !ISBLANK(Shipping_Address_NEW__c), TEXT(CurrencyIsoCode)=TEXT(Account.CurrencyIsoCode), ISPICKVAL(Payment_Terms__c, 'Due in advance'), !ISBLANK(Account.Billing_First_Name__c), !ISBLANK(Account.Billing_Last_Name__c), !ISBLANK(Account.Billing_Email__c), !ISBLANK(Account.Billing_Phone__c), !ISBLANK(Account.BillingStreet), !ISBLANK(Account.BillingCity), !ISBLANK(Account.BillingPostalCode), ISPICKVAL(Configuration_Segment__c,'Non Express'), OR( !ISBLANK(Shipping_and_Handling_Amount__c), Freight_Cost__c != 99999.99, !ISBLANK(Shipping_and_Handling_Manual__c) ), OR( AND( !ISBLANK(Account.BillingState), OR( Account.BillingCountry='United States', Account.BillingCountry='Canada', Account.BillingCountry='Mexico' ) ), AND( ISBLANK(Account.BillingState), OR( ISPICKVAL(Account.CurrencyIsoCode,'GBP'), ISPICKVAL(Account.CurrencyIsoCode,'EUR') ), IF( CASE( Account.BillingCountry, 'United Kingdom', 1, 'France', 1, 'Belgium', 1, 'Germany', 1, 'Netherlands', 1, 'Ireland', 1, 'Austria', 1, 'Italy', 1, 'Luxembourg', 1, 'Switzerland',1, 0 ) = 1, true, false ) ) ) ), 'https://www.samsara.com/checkout/opportunity?id='+Opportunity_UUID__c, IF( AND( !ISPICKVAL(Shipping_Address_NEW__r.Shipping_Country__c, "Switzerland"), Total_License_Due__c > 0, !ISBLANK(Shipping_Contact__c),
OR( AND(SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__c != NULL, ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__r.SBQQ__Status__c,"Approved") ), AND(SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__c == NULL, Renewal__c == true ) ) ), 'https://www.samsara.com/checkout/opportunity?id='+Opportunity_UUID__c, '' ) ), '' ) )
CustomField.label: Checkout Agreement Link
